body:
> So, I guess just a function like Do(httpClient, ctx, req) then?

Making a request just for GET is annoying, so probably also `GET`.

> I don't think a RoundTripper works, it goes against the intent of the context package by putting a Context into a struct.

Be sure to also file a bug against Google's internal codebase to make sure all our various `RoundTripper`s support the new Cancel field.
